description:
Part A: Chio-chan happily heads to school after spending the whole night gaming, but her usual route is blocked because of construction.
Part B: Chio-chan wakes up much earlier than usual.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Because the School Is There / Chio-chan and Hosokawa-san
Si loin, si proche / Chio et Yuki
Soko ni Gakkou ga Aru kara / Chio-chan to Hosokawa-san
Weil dort die Schule ist / Chio und Yuki
そこに学校があるから / ちおちゃんと細川さん
